about_the_game:
Nigelopia Mini Mix is a retro-styled 2D platform action game that takes place on the island of Nigelopia, where the people are wild and crazy and fun and the girls are hot, cute, thicc, gassy and strong. Honestly, with the fact that OnlyFans, ecchi anime and hip hop booty music videos all exist, the world’s more talented people than us should be making more games or animations about this exact type of subject, Nigelopia or otherwise! Harems and hentai already gave you enough Japanese geeks gettin’ rubbed off on by busty caucasian-lookin’ hotties. A big focus in Nigelopia is polyamory between hot thick girls of all races and the geeky black men who love them. Although, Nigelopian girls will bang all races of men. And women. And other things.

This game here’s got a very rich amount of lore and dialogue that takes some presentational influence from Japanese anime! A cool original sountrack, too! You can play through a 10 level campaign as any of 4 quirky Nigelopian friends, all with unique dialogue and some unique abilities. Finish ‘em all, and the game will be 100 percent clear!

Let’s be honest, the most defining ASSpect of Nigelopia is the butt. The BIG butt. Also the COMPLETELY OPTIONAL Fart Mode that adds even more power to the big ol’ butt. Dang.

The game was patched after launch to address many crashes and improve certain ASSpects of it!

Honestly, with the fact that OnlyFans, ecchi anime and hip hop booty music videos all exist, the world’s more talented people than us should be making more games or animations about this exact type of subject, Nigelopia or otherwise! A big focus in Nigelopia is polyamory between hot thick girls of all races and the geeky black men who love them. Although, Nigelopian girls will bang all races of men. And women. And other things.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: Dark Paradise Nigelopia: Mini Mix Plus Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 4205U @ 1.80GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 4205U @ 1.80GHz 1.80 GHz or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Nigelopia, The Dark Paradise. A 2D-Booty platformer about pretty, polyamorous, pansexual and powerful big butt girls who fart loud and long as heck all the time! Farting is optional though. Fully voiced audio, new story content and new playable people coming in 2025!
